actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of additional district judges, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment of additional district judges in the States of Alabama, California, Florida, Georgia, Indiana, Kansas, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Minnesota, Missouri, New Jersey, New York, Oklahoma, Oregon, Tennessee, Texas, Virginia, Washington and Wisconsin. Makes the existing district judgeship for the eastern district of North Carolina a permanent judgeship. (Amends 28 U.D.C. 133)

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of additional district judges, and for other purposes.
